languages.text: Длительные поиски маршала ослабили Адептус Арбитес настолько, что их новый глава был вынужден потратить остаток жизни на восстановление порядка внутри собственной организации. Пока Арбитес решали внутренние проблемы, беззаконие и непослушание буйным цветом разрослись по всему Простору.

The protracted search for a Marshal had so weakened the Adeptus Arbites that their new leader had to spend the rest of their life restoring order within the organisation. While the Arbites were busy dealing with their internal problems, lawlessness and disobedience flourished throughout the Expanse.
languages.original_text: Длительные поиски маршала ослабили Адептус Арбитес настолько, что их новый глава был вынужден потратить остаток жизни на восстановление порядка внутри собственной организации. Пока Арбитес решали внутренние проблемы, беззаконие и непослушание буйным цветом разрослись по всему Простору.

traits.locale_text: The protracted search for a marshal had so weakened the Adeptus Arbites that their new leader had to spend the rest of his life restoring order within his organisation. While the Arbites were dealing with their internal problems, lawlessness and disobedience flourished throughout the Expanse.

The protracted search for a marshal had so weakened the Adeptus Arbites that their new leader had to spend the rest of his life restoring order within his organisation. While the Arbites were dealing with their internal problems, lawlessness and disobedience flourished throughout the Expanse.

The protracted search for a Marshal had so weakened the Adeptus Arbites that their new leader had to spend the rest of their life restoring order within the organisation. While the Arbites were busy dealing with their internal problems, lawlessness and disobedience flourished throughout the Expanse.

The protracted search for a Marshal had so weakened the Adeptus Arbites that their new leader had to spend the rest of their life restoring order within the organisation. While the Arbites were busy dealing with their internal problems, lawlessness and disobedience flourished throughout the Expanse.

languages.text: Die langwierige Suche nach einem Marschall hatte die Adeptus Arbites so sehr geschwächt, dass ihr neuer Anführer den Rest seines Lebens damit beschäftigt war, die Ordnung in der Organisation wiederherzustellen. Und während die Arbites mit ihren internen Problemen beschäftigt waren, florierten überall in der Ausdehnung Gesetzlosigkeit und Ungehorsam.
languages.original_text: The protracted search for a Marshal had so weakened the Adeptus Arbites that their new leader had to spend the rest of their life restoring order within the organisation. While the Arbites were busy dealing with their internal problems, lawlessness and disobedience flourished throughout the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Die langwierige Suche nach einem Marschall hatte die Adeptus Arbites so sehr geschwächt, dass ihr neuer Anführer den Rest seines Lebens damit beschäftigt war, die Ordnung in der Organisation wiederherzustellen. Und während die Arbites mit ihren internen Problemen beschäftigt waren, florierten überall in der Ausdehnung Gesetzlosigkeit und Ungehorsam.

languages.text: L'Adeptus Arbites fut tellement affaibli par l'interminable recherche d'un nouveau maréchal que son nouveau chef passa le reste de sa vie à rétablir l'ordre au sein de l'organisation, et que les Étendues, livrées à elles-mêmes, sombrèrent peu à peu dans l'anarchie la plus totale.
languages.original_text: The protracted search for a Marshal had so weakened the Adeptus Arbites that their new leader had to spend the rest of their life restoring order within the organisation. While the Arbites were busy dealing with their internal problems, lawlessness and disobedience flourished throughout the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: L'Adeptus Arbites fut tellement affaibli par l'interminable recherche d'un nouveau maréchal que son nouveau chef passa le reste de sa vie à rétablir l'ordre au sein de l'organisation, et que les Étendues, livrées à elles-mêmes, sombrèrent peu à peu dans l'anarchie la plus totale.

languages.text: 法务部一直在寻找适合担任元帅的人选。漫长的寻找削弱了法务部的力量，因此新任元帅上任后，不得不将余生全部用来恢复法务部的内部秩序。法务部被内部问题搞得焦头烂额，而目无法纪的恶行在科罗努斯扩区到处肆虐。
languages.original_text: The protracted search for a Marshal had so weakened the Adeptus Arbites that their new leader had to spend the rest of their life restoring order within the organisation. While the Arbites were busy dealing with their internal problems, lawlessness and disobedience flourished throughout the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 法务部一直在寻找适合担任元帅的人选。漫长的寻找削弱了法务部的力量，因此新任元帅上任后，不得不将余生全部用来恢复法务部的内部秩序。法务部被内部问题搞得焦头烂额，而目无法纪的恶行在科罗努斯扩区到处肆虐。
法务部一直在寻找适合担任元帅的人选。漫长的寻找削弱了法务部的力量，因此新任元帅上任后，不得不将余生全部用来恢复法务部的内部秩序。法务部被内部问题搞得焦头烂额，而目无法纪的恶行在科罗努斯扩区到处肆虐。

languages.text: La larga búsqueda de un Mariscal había debilitado tanto al Adeptus Arbites que su nuevo líder tuvo que dedicar el resto de su vida a restaurar el orden en la organización. Mientras el Arbites solucionaba sus problemas internos, la criminalidad y la desobediencia florecieron por toda la Extensión.
languages.original_text: The protracted search for a Marshal had so weakened the Adeptus Arbites that their new leader had to spend the rest of their life restoring order within the organisation. While the Arbites were busy dealing with their internal problems, lawlessness and disobedience flourished throughout the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: La larga búsqueda de un Mariscal había debilitado tanto al Adeptus Arbites que su nuevo líder tuvo que dedicar el resto de su vida a restaurar el orden en la organización. Mientras el Arbites solucionaba sus problemas internos, la criminalidad y la desobediencia florecieron por toda la Extensión.

languages.text: 将帥を長期間探し求めたことで、高等裁定局はかなり弱体化し、新たな指導者は組織内の秩序を回復するために残りの生涯を費やさなければならなかった。高等裁定局が内部問題に忙殺されている間に、エクスパンス全域では無法と不服従がはびこった。
languages.original_text: The protracted search for a Marshal had so weakened the Adeptus Arbites that their new leader had to spend the rest of their life restoring order within the organisation. While the Arbites were busy dealing with their internal problems, lawlessness and disobedience flourished throughout the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 将帥を長期間探し求めたことで、高等裁定局はかなり弱体化し、新たな指導者は組織内の秩序を回復するために残りの生涯を費やさなければならなかった。高等裁定局が内部問題に忙殺されている間に、エクスパンス全域では無法と不服従がはびこった。

languages.text: Bir Miralay için bitmek bilmeyen arayış, Adeptus Arbites'i o denli zayıflatmıştı ki yeni önderleri, ömrünün kalanını teşkilat içerisinde düzeni yeniden sağlamak uğrunda tüketmek zorunda kaldı. Yargıcılar kendi iç sorunlarıyla boğuşurken kanunsuzluk ve itaatsizlik, Enginlik'in her zerresine alabildiğine yayıldı.
languages.original_text: The protracted search for a Marshal had so weakened the Adeptus Arbites that their new leader had to spend the rest of their life restoring order within the organisation. While the Arbites were busy dealing with their internal problems, lawlessness and disobedience flourished throughout the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Bir Miralay için bitmek bilmeyen arayış, Adeptus Arbites'i o denli zayıflatmıştı ki yeni önderleri, ömrünün kalanını teşkilat içerisinde düzeni yeniden sağlamak uğrunda tüketmek zorunda kaldı. Yargıcılar kendi iç sorunlarıyla boğuşurken kanunsuzluk ve itaatsizlik, Enginlik'in her zerresine alabildiğine yayıldı.
